reviews.review: good game but there are a lot of cheaters

It' a fun game but when you buy it.
If you are the type of guy of wants to play it for free, then be ready to play with ALOT of cheaters.
It's nearly impossible to not play with a cheater if you are a f2p user. Of course sometimes you will not be in a game with cheaters but the majority of times there's cheater and it's the negative part of the game.
But other than that it's one of the best game i've played. I'ts fun playing solo or with friends and it's chill

9/10
